thumb.name: What We Wish for You Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMatthew.%3Cbr%3EWe all think you're special...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and we wish you%3Cbr%3E a Birthday%3Cbr%3Eyou'll remember%3Cbr%3Eas one of your best.%3Cbr%3Eand the happiness%3Cbr%3Eyou deserve%3Cbr%3Eeach day%3Cbr%3Eof the year.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEnjoy!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Birthday Wish
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Your%3Cbr%3EBirthday.%3Cbr%3EStephanie.%3Cbr%3EBecause%3Cbr%3EYou're%3Cbr%3ESpecial%3Cbr%3Eto Me%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA birthday wish to tell you%3Cbr%3Ethat you mean so much to me.%3Cbr%3EFor you have that extra something%3Cbr%3Ethat I hardlly ever see %26#151;%3Cbr%3EIt's a warmth. an honest caring.%3Cbr%3Ethat draws others close to you%3Cbr%3EAnd makes you someone special%3Cbr%3Eevery day the whole year through!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Wonderful Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Best Birthday Ever
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'My best%3Cbr%3Ebirthday%3Cbr%3Ewould be%3Cbr%3Eif I could%3Cbr%3Ego to the%3Cbr%3Eamusement%3Cbr%3Epark and%3Cbr%3Estay there%3Cbr%3Efor my%3Cbr%3Ewhole life!'%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EAaron. Age 6%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENo matter how you spend it.%3Cbr%3ESharon.%3Cbr%3Ehope this is%3Cbr%3Eyour best Birthday ever!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Day to Celebrate!
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'A Birthday%3Cbr%3Eis our own special holiday %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ea day to celebrate%3Cbr%3Eand be celebrated by others!'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETake time%3Cbr%3Eto enjoy your birthday.%3Cbr%3EPaul %26#151;%3Cbr%3Eit's a day%3Cbr%3Ethat's all your own.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHAPPY BIRTHDAY%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're Someone Special
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo Know You%3Cbr%3EIs to Know%3Cbr%3ESomebody Special%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo know you%3Cbr%3Eis to know somebody special%3Cbr%3ESomeone with a warm%3Cbr%3Eand thoughtful way%3Cbr%3EOf making life%3Cbr%3Eespecially nice for others%3Cbr%3EAnd adding so much sunshine%3Cbr%3Eto each day...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo know you%3Cbr%3Eis to want you to be happy %26#151;%3Cbr%3ETo have your every wish%3Cbr%3Eand dream come true %26#151;%3Cbr%3EAnd so. not just at birthday time.%3Cbr%3Ebut always.%3Cbr%3EYou're wished the best%3Cbr%3Ethat life can bring to you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Wonderful%3Cbr%3EBirthday

thumb.name: Thank God You Were Born
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESara.%3Cbr%3EYour Friendship's%3Cbr%3Ea Blessing to Me%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe love that comes from special friends%3Cbr%3Eso often brings a smile%3Cbr%3ETo cheer our thoughts and lift our hearts%3Cbr%3Eand make life so worthwhile.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe love that comes from special friends%3Cbr%3Ecan be so comforting --%3Cbr%3EAs warm and bright and nurturing%3Cbr%3Eas sunny days in Spring...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe love that comes from special friends%3Cbr%3EMeans more than words can say.%3Cbr%3EFor special friends are miracles%3Cbr%3Ethat bless our lives each day.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI can never thank God enough%3Cbr%3Ethat you were born%3Cbr%3Eand that He blessed my life%3Cbr%3Ewith the gift of your friendship!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Eand Bless You Always

thumb.name: Don't Count the Candles
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn your birthday.%3Cbr%3EMargie --%3Cbr%3Ecount your blessings.%3Cbr%3Enot the candles.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENo one wants to%3Cbr%3Estand around all day%3Cbr%3Ewaiting for%3Cbr%3Ea piece of cake.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Birthday Miracles
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Your Birthday. Emily%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMy wish for you%3Cbr%3Eis a light soul%3Cbr%3Eand a happy heart.%3Cbr%3Ethat you make%3Cbr%3Elaughter%3Cbr%3Eas important%3Cbr%3Eas air.%3Cbr%3Eand play%3Cbr%3Eas essential%3Cbr%3Eas hard work...%3Cbr%3EThat you believe%3Cbr%3Ein yourself%3Cbr%3Eand the magic%3Cbr%3Eand power%3Cbr%3Ethat are all your own.%3Cbr%3Eand that your eyes%3Cbr%3Eare open%3Cbr%3Eto the miracles%3Cbr%3Ewithin and around you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis is my wish for you.%3Cbr%3EEmily.%3Cbr%3Eon your birthday%3Cbr%3Eand all through%3Cbr%3Ethe coming year.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Every Good Thing
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJessica.%3Cbr%3EThinking of you%3Cbr%3E on your birthday...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and wishing you%3Cbr%3Eevery good thing%3Cbr%3Ein life.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday

thumb.name: Playing Your Song
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWell. Judy...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...looks like%3Cbr%3Ethey're playing your song!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Wish for Happiness
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday.%3Cbr%3EGeorge%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe world is so full%3Cbr%3Eof a number of things.%3Cbr%3EI'm sure we should all%3Cbr%3Ebe as happy as kings.%3Cbr%3ERobert Louis Stevenson%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you%3Cbr%3Eeverything%3Cbr%3Ethat makes you happy%3Cbr%3Eon your birthday%3Cbr%3Eand always.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're Always Special
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's your Birthday %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ea wonderful time%3Cbr%3Eto wish you%3Cbr%3Eall the good things%3Cbr%3Ein life...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and remind you%3Cbr%3Ehow special you are%3Cbr%3Eevery day of the year.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Great%3Cbr%3EBirthday

thumb.name: Birthday Advice
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E On Your Birthday.%3Cbr%3EColleen%3Cbr%3E'Live each day%3Cbr%3Ewith so much%3Cbr%3Ejoy and gratitude%3Cbr%3Ethat you couldn't%3Cbr%3Eimagine living it%3Cbr%3Eany other way.'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you%3Cbr%3Ea very happy%3Cbr%3Ebirthday.

thumb.name: Like Family to Me
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJane.%3Cbr%3EYou're Someone%3Cbr%3EVery Special%3Cbr%3EWho's%3Cbr%3ELike Family%3Cbr%3Eto Me%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIn a way.%3Cbr%3EI think we do choose our families.%3Cbr%3EOf course we have the family we're given.%3Cbr%3Ebut if we're really lucky.%3Cbr%3Ewe also have people in our lives%3Cbr%3Ewho care about us so genuinely and personally%3Cbr%3Ethat we come to think of them as family. too...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...and that's how%3Cbr%3EI'll always think%3Cbr%3Eof you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Have a Groovy Birthday
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ESmile.%3Cbr%3ETed!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E...and have%3Cbr%3Ea groovy%3Cbr%3Ebirthday!

thumb.name: A Million Happy Days Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ESurprise. Kelly!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you%3Cbr%3Ea bright and happy birthday%3Cbr%3Eand a million happy tomorrows!

thumb.name: Birthday Pleasures
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday. Leslie%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay birthday pleasures. large and small. Make this day you'll long recall As one of your finest. one of your best. And one of your very happiest!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Awesome Birthday
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EParty Time.%3Cbr%3ENicole!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETake it to the MAXXXX!%3Cbr%3ERock 'n Roll!%3Cbr%3EBe Jammin'!%3Cbr%3ECrank up the Birthday Tunes!%3Cbr%3EPump it Up!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a totally awesome birthday %3Cbr%3Eand a way-cool year!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You Make World Nicer
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMark.%3Cbr%3EThis world is%3Cbr%3Ea little nicer...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...because of%3Cbr%3Especial people%3Cbr%3Elike you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Song in Your Soul
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EPaul -- Birthday Wishes for You May life fill your soul with song and your heart with happiness...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3Eon your birthday and all through a wonderful year.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Happy Moments
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday from Kelly%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay your birthday and each day that follows. be filled with happy moments -- each better than the one before!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Today's Your Day
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Your Birthday. Chris! Today is your day to sing your song. to dance your dance. to step out of the box and be more than you've ever dreamed you could be...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a joyous birthday!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Young At Heart Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou are%3Cbr%3Eonly as old%3Cbr%3Eas you%3Cbr%3Eact. Chris!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday. Baby!

thumb.name: Wishing You Beauty
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EOn%3Cbr%3E Your%3Cbr%3EBirthday.%3Cbr%3EJean%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWalk on a rainbow trail.%3Cbr%3EWalk on a trail of song%3Cbr%3EAnd all around you%3Cbr%3Ewill be beauty...%3Cbr%3ENavaho Song%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E %3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EMay the sun bring you%3Cbr%3Enew energies by day.%3Cbr%3E may the moon softly%3Cbr%3E restore you by night.%3Cbr%3E may gentle breezes%3Cbr%3E refresh your soul.%3Cbr%3E may you walk gently%3Cbr%3E through the world%3Cbr%3E and know its beauty.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: If I Could Talk to Angels
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKelly.%3Cbr%3Eif I could talk to angels.%3Cbr%3EI'd ask the lucky one%3Cbr%3Ethat watches over you%3Cbr%3Eto make sure you have%3Cbr%3Ethe happiest birthday ever%3Cbr%3Eand get lots of compliments.%3Cbr%3Ehugs. and presents%3Cbr%3Ethat make you smile...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThen I'd put in a special order%3Cbr%3Eto make sure %3Cbr%3Eall your wishes come true%3Cbr%3Ein the year ahead.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E
